# Lentainform

## Example

### Basic

```html
<amp-embed
  width="100"
  height="283"
  type="lentainform"
  data-publisher="amp-demo"
  data-widget="12345"
  data-container="demo-container"
>
</amp-embed>
```

## Configuration

For details on the configuration semantics, please contact the ad network or refer to their documentation.

### Required parameters

-   `data-publisher`
-   `data-widget`
-   `data-container`

### Optional parameters

-   `data-url`
-   `data-options`
